# AUTHORITY FOR COMMITTEES TO MEET
## `ad24f661c455b76c0e040be625e00193`
`Mr. INOUYE â€” 1 October 2009`

---


Mr. INOUYE. Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Committee 
on Foreign Relations be authorized to meet during the session of the 
Senate on October 1, 2009, at 10 a.m., to hold a hearing entitled 
''Afghanistan's Impact on Pakistan.''
